page.title: 06LEISURE IN BURSCOUGH 2
page.content: 2) The Football Club has a capacity of 3000 although the usual weekly crowd is 150-250.The largest crowd was 5421 ,in 1948,against Wigan Athletic.The local team(Linnets)play in the N.W. Counties League against teams like:Fleetwood WInsford,Glossop and Accrington.The club colours are green and white.The players are paid expenses only. 3) The Library building originally housed the Council offices and book library on the top floor. When the Clinic moved to the Health Centre both the sevices moved to the ground floor. 4) The Boxing Club has about 30 young people from 11 to 30 years in training at any one time.They box throughout the North West. The Club has been in existence for 15 years.
